metadata.name: The Human Spark with Alan Alda
metadata.summary: Alan Alda visits dozens of scientists on three continents to find out: What makes us human?
metadata.description: Alan Alda visits dozens of scientists on three continents -- and even undergoes an examination of his own brain -- to find the answer to one question: What makes us human?
metadata.keywords: PBS, Human Spark, Alan Alda, science, brain
